doc:
Yvette Wilson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yvette_Wilson 0 Yvette Renee Wilson (March 6, 1964 – June 14, 2012) was an American comedian and actress. Wilson was best known for her role as Andell Wilkerson, the shopkeeper of the local hangout on the UPN sitcom Moesha (1996–2001); and restaurant owner and Nikki's (played by Mo'Nique) bestfriend on its spinoff The Parkers (1999–2004). She had appeared in many comedy films such as House Party 3, Friday, and on Russell Simmons' Def Comedy Jam. Wilson died from cervical cancer at the age of 48. Yvette_Renee_Wilson ( March_6_,_1964 – June_14_,_2012 ) was an_American_comedian_and_actress . Wilson was_best_known for her_role as Andell_Wilkerson , the_shopkeeper of the_local_hangout on the_UPN_sitcom_Moesha_(_1996 – 2001_) ; and restaurant_owner and Nikki 's_( played by Mo'Nique_)_bestfriend on its_spinoff The_Parkers ( 1999 – 2004_) . She had_appeared in many_comedy_films such_as House_Party_3 , Friday , and on Russell_Simmons '_Def_Comedy_Jam . Wilson died from cervical_cancer at the_age of 48 .
